title: Nigeria's suffering ignored?
teaser: New satellite images have been released showing what Amnesty International calls ‘catastrophic devastation’ in two Nigerian towns attacked recently by Boko Haram. Hundreds have been killed in Baga on the day of Charlie Hebdo attack. World Have Your Say asks if the western media pays too much attention to events in France, and not enough to Nigeria.
